When this flask is shattered, its contents fill an area with a deadly distilled element.

Level: 1
Category: Alchemical Item (Volatile)
Time: 30 min.
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 70 gp
Key Skill: Arcana or Thievery

Attack Power (Varies) âœ¦ Consumable (Standard Action)

Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 (creatures in the burst); the item's level + 3 vs. Reflex

Hit: The target takes 1d6 damage of the chosen type.

Level 6: 2d6 damage of the chosen type.

Level 11 or 16: 3d6 damage of the chosen type.

Level 21 or 26: 4d6 damage of the chosen type.

Miss: Half damage.



Published in Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium, page(s) 130.
